description: Detects unusual processes accessing desktop.ini, which can be leveraged to alter how Explorer displays a folder's content (i.e. renaming files) without changing them on disk.
false_positives: Operations performed through Windows SCCM or equivalent
name: Suspicious desktop.ini Action
query: (file.path.text:*\\desktop.ini AND (NOT ((process.executable.text:(C\:\\Windows\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\*)) OR (process.executable.text:*\\AppData\\Local\\JetBrains\\Toolbox\\bin\\7z.exe AND file.path.text:*\\JetBrains\\apps\\*) OR (file.path.text:C\:\\$WINDOWS.\~BT\\NewOS\\*))))
author: Maxime Thiebaut (@0xThiebaut)
Tim Shelton (HAWK.IO)
